Text:
Does this contain both the orginal and the alternate ending.  I'm certain it does but just wanted to make sure.

Thanks for the upload GoodFilms.  Keep up the good work!  All of us need you to stick around, especially since jonny has left us.
As is clearly stated, this is the alternate cut.

Do you recommend seeing this or the normal movie first?

Thank you for the upload.
But it says 99 mins for the alternate cut in imdb?

The REFiNED release has the theatrical ending (3rd cut/spielberg).

This has the original ending (1st cut/directors cut).

The ending everyone saw on the screener (2nd cut) was made because the 1 time the directors cut was shown, audiences didnt like it.

There are 3 cuts total.

The 2nd cut from the screener was not included with the studio dvd/bluray release.

Doesn't matter which version you see first. Only the last scene (about 1 minute) is different. Both good, just... different.

This rip seems to have file corruption.  The video is very choppy and freezes frequently.  The audio is out of sync and levels are too low.  I tried viewing this with DIVX and also with VLC.  Other movies work fine but this one has big problems.
